name: Fortress Siege Demo Script
description: Scripted five-turn experience that guarantees the demo advances even if models fail.

turns.title: predictive_setup
turns.summary: Engine primes defensive barriers, lanterns pulse and distant siege drums echo.

fallback.narrative: Sentinel pylons bloom with orange wards while scouts chart every breach lane.
actions: Raise barricades along the northern wall.
Dim the courtyard lamps and focus lantern beams outward.
Pipe in the distant howl of war horns to foreshadow the siege.

turns.title: scout_report
turns.summary: Recon patrols slip back through the smoke with measured intelligence.

fallback.narrative: Ila's scout band spills a parchment of siege tower schematics and whisper about tunneling foes.
actions: Surface a guaranteed intel event about enemy troop movements.
Mark weak lattice sections for engineers to reinforce.
Flag a calm-but-tense atmosphere with rustling pennants.

turns.title: civilian_evac
turns.summary: Town criers move civilians to inner keeps before bombardments begin.

fallback.narrative: Bell towers chime thrice and messengers herd families through the underpass tunnels.
actions: Queue a UI broadcast reminding players to secure non-combatants.
Guarantee at least one logistics option remains selectable.
Overlay audio hints of muffled panic to keep tension up.

turns.title: low_conflict
turns.summary: Resolve a controlled skirmish via scripted combat fallback.

fallback.narrative: A raider probe tests the barricadesâ€”defenders answer with warning bolts and crackling oil.
actions: Invoke resolve_combat fallback with deterministic casualty numbers.
Update threat meters without touching core morale.
Spawn a breach marker that the UI can highlight.

turns.title: finale_setup
turns.summary: Stage the mini-finale hook to promise a cliffhanger.

fallback.narrative: Engineers align crystal cannons while the captain orders one decisive countercharge rehearsal.
actions: Lock in a cinematic directive for the last stand.
Refresh atmosphere cues with smoky light shafts.
Ensure at least one NPC movement is showcased on the plaza.
